intro: Enjoy happy pastime together with your beloved pets.
description:
Game offers interesting ways to find funny and playful pets, as well as bright hidden objects, and a set of popular mini-games. 
Meet and make friends with these funny pets in beautiful game locations where they are always ready to hide and fool around.
Use your skills and knowledge to play mini-games and find all the hidden objects.     

Collector's edition includes:
- 8 additional locations for even more cute pets to find!
- 8 more mini-games!
- Listen to the relaxing soundtracks
